channel.title: Projects on Clint Berry
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Clint Berry

item.title: Projects
item.description:
All projects that I release to the public are hosted at my GitHub account.

ZFcodo

Code Generator for Zend Framework based on Qcodo/Qcubed code generation. Read more at this post.

The project is hosted at the zf-codo github.

StickerMeMine

I am the founder of this soon-to-launch company. I am currently building a web-based sticker creator using Javascript, SVG, and @font-face technology. This project is heavily based on the amazing svg-edit project.
